levelA.1.1.1: Non-text Content - All images have alt text
levelA.1.3.3: Sensory Characteristics - Instructions not solely visual
levelA.1.4.1: Use of Color - Color not sole means of conveying info
levelA.1.4.2: Audio Control - Auto-playing audio can be paused
levelA.2.1.2: No Keyboard Trap - Focus can move away from components
levelA.2.2.1: Timing Adjustable - Time limits can be extended
levelA.2.2.2: Pause, Stop, Hide - Moving content can be paused
levelA.2.4.1: Bypass Blocks - Skip links or other bypass method
levelA.3.1.1: Language of Page - Page language specified
levelA.3.2.1: On Focus - No context changes on focus
levelA.3.2.2: On Input - No context changes on user input
levelA.3.3.2: Labels or Instructions - Form controls have labels
levelA.4.1.2: Name, Role, Value - UI components have accessible names

levelAA.1.4.3: Contrast (Minimum) - 4.5:1 for normal text, 3:1 for large
levelAA.1.4.4: Resize text - Text can be resized to 200% without loss
levelAA.1.4.5: Images of Text - Real text preferred over images
levelAA.1.4.11: Non-text Contrast - 3:1 contrast for UI components
levelAA.1.4.12: Text Spacing - Text spacing can be adjusted
levelAA.1.4.13: Content on Hover/Focus - Dismissible, hoverable, persistent
levelAA.2.4.4: Link Purpose (In Context) - Link purpose clear from context
levelAA.2.4.5: Multiple Ways - Multiple ways to find pages
levelAA.2.4.6: Headings and Labels - Descriptive headings and labels
levelAA.2.4.7: Focus Visible - Keyboard focus indicator visible
levelAA.2.5.1: Pointer Gestures - Functionality not dependent on path-based gestures
levelAA.2.5.2: Pointer Cancellation - Up event used or abort/undo available
levelAA.2.5.3: Label in Name - Accessible name contains visible text
levelAA.2.5.4: Motion Actuation - Motion-triggered functionality can be disabled
levelAA.3.1.2: Language of Parts - Language changes identified
levelAA.3.2.3: Consistent Navigation - Navigation consistent across pages
levelAA.3.3.3: Error Suggestion - Error correction suggestions provided
levelAA.3.3.4: Error Prevention - Important submissions are reversible
levelAA.4.1.3: Status Messages - Status messages programmatically determined
